institution: The University of Oklahoma and Universidad Nacional de Colombia
description: Co-initiated a course-based research collaboration that led to a graduate seminar at UNAL; support course design, mentor projects, and pursue an extension of prior graph-design research in close collaboration with my OU advisor.

institution: Gradaute Student Senate @ The University of Oklahoma
description: Contributed to decision-making to enhance the university environment, including approving the budget for student associations at the University of Oklahoma.
Participated as a panelist, providing guidance and sharing experiences to help high school senior girls explore their career options and make informed decisions about their futures.
